title: Palamedes JSON Refactor Audit Log (Phase A Refresh & Phase B)

audit_entries.rationale: Legacy fragments in metadata_schema/file_architecture/ contained superior descriptive detail (purpose, benefits) and scripting logic not present in the new schema. Merged all details into a hardened schema/file_architecture_schema.json.
Nested fragments contained critical 'path_to_scripting' logic. Updated top-level protocol to include these details and corrected legacy .chat/ paths to the new memory/comms/ system.
Consolidated detailed steps from fragments. Updated legacy references (e.g., design_principles.json -> agent_error_log.json) and standardized communication paths to memory/comms/.
Unified 40+ redundant rule fragments into a single hardened protocol. Updated all legacy .chat/ paths to the current memory/comms/ system and integrated scripting logic.
Consolidated detailed steps and scripting logic from fragments. Verified top-level protocol is hardened and ready for standalone use.

audit_entries.recommendation: REVIVE THE QUEUE -> Execute rm commands
audit_entries.rationale: Successfully executed 46 queued deletions (Daedalus + Palamedes legacy). Heartwood is now physically consolidated and hardened. Redundant sub-trees (metadata_schema/, agent_protocols/, etc.) have been removed.

audit_entries.recommendation: RECOVER LOST WISDOM -> Re-inject omitted rationales and mandates
audit_entries.rationale: Forensic comparison with pre-refactor state (Dec 29) identified critical omissions. Re-injected mandatory commit tool usage into git_methodology.json, restored deep rationale for agent justification, and enhanced base schema definitions for better validation.
Relocated foundational recursive logic to the logic/ branch. Added metadata and a note regarding the future intent to migrate this logic to a dedicated repository.
Reduced the legislative glossary to its ultimate essence: Absurdity. This term now serves as the primary logical filter for the entire swarm.
